name: CORE Business Services
overview:
Their objective is to develop accounting and bookkeeping solutions that help increase revenue, control costs and promote business growth. They offer a full range of bookkeeping, accounting and consultation services. Some of our services include:

  • Bookkeeping
  • Business Plans
  • Accounting
  • Quickbooks Training
  • Business Reporting
  • Performa Financial Statements
  • Quarterly Tax Reporting
  • Bank Account Reconciliation
  • Payroll Services
  • Budgeting and Forecasting
  • Cash Flow Analysis
  • Gross Margin Analysis
  • Implementation of Checks and Balances to Prevent Fraud

Business Plans are needed for seeking funding for your new business, or expansion of your existing business. CORE Business Services can gather your information and create a business plan that will help solidify your business and help gain funding if needed.
